desc: We are a Colorado local Business. We sell trail mixes, Dried Fruits, Nuts and Seeds, Chocolate Confections, and Candies. We roast our own nuts and seeds, make our own chocolate, and create all our own trail mixes from the finest ingredients.

layout.text: Based out of Colorado, Rivertrail Foods is a snack foods wholesaler. We sell everything from roasted nuts and seeds, to dried fruits, to hand mixed trail mix, and even delicious chocolates and candies.
